title: Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.
body: Can someone give me their ideas? I suddenly cannot connect to the PvP.net server on my home pc or laptop. It seems like servers are up and I don't see anyone else having the same problem. Can someone point me in the right direction? I have played every day this week with no problems.

replies.body: There may be a network issue failing to reach our servers, which would results in that error.  If the issue is still occurring, run over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a fix.  Let me know if that helps.
Same here. I have AT&T Uverse. Im sad. {{item:3070}}

Try running League of Legends as an Administrator. 
1. Right click the LOL icon on your desktop
2. Click "run as administrator"
3. Depending if you are on the admin account of your computer or not, it may ask you for a password
